object_work_type: digital prints artists' proofs colour slides
physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are purple in colour. The images depict a worker standing at the top of a wooden ramp. The worker is wearing a pink shirt and adorns a brown hat. Two pails are suspended from a shoulder yoke that is being carried by the worker.The background of the images depict the cloudless blue sky as well. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. ""Tough Job"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
